entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
